entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:58 p.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
